items.text: whack. Dropped short on off stump, gets deep in the crease and swats this to the midwicket boundary with a clean swing
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on's right off the back foot
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, 1 run

items.text: there can be no doubt here. Cremer stuck in the crease. The ball skids in, too quick for him as he looks to flick. On the knee roll, in front of middle stump. Umpires gives it
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, OUT

dismissal.text: AG Cremer lbw b Rubel Hossain 23 (31b 3x4 0x6) SR: 74.19

items.text: indipper again, full at middle stump. Pushes on the front foot, gets an inside edge to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jarvis, no run

items.text: low full toss outside off, driven back to the bowler on the bounce
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jarvis, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, pushed to point off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jarvis, no run

items.text: good length in the corridor, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jarvis, no run

items.text: inswinger in the corridor, defended down the pitch
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jarvis, no run

items.text: loopy full one outside off, drilled straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good length outside off, pushed to extra cover on the front foot
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended to point off the outside half
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven to sweeper cover after stepping out
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, leans in, beaten
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Jarvis, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, pushed to mid-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Jarvis, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, steps out and looks to slog over midwicket. Inside edge rolls out to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: short ball wide outside off, goes deep in the crease and spanks it over extra cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sikandar Raza, FOUR runs

items.text: arm ball headed for middle stump, makes him back away a long way and he just manages to get bat on the attempted cut
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: length and in at leg stump, punched to deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Jarvis, no run

items.text: length on off stump, pushed to point on the front foot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Jarvis, no run

items.text: lovely shot. Steps out and gets leg side of this length ball angled across him. Slaps it on the up to clear mid-off very deliberately
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, FOUR runs

items.text: inside edge misses off stump and runs past Rahim. He's looking to cut this, but it keeps low. Fine leg cleans up to his right
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, 2 runs

items.text: drags it on. Picks the offcutter and plays what he will think is a poor shot. It's back of a length and climbing up wide outside off. He walks into it and can't get on top of the bounce. This is especially important, because the shot he's looking to play is a flick. The ball's going away from him all the time. He can only manage an inside edge onto leg stump
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, OUT

dismissal.text: Sikandar Raza  b Mustafizur Rahman 39 (59b 4x4 1x6) SR: 66.10

items.preText: Two slips and a gully for Chatara. He goes around the wicket.
items.text: edge doesn't carry to slip and he can't stop it either. Sneaks through from between his legs and into the boundary. A proper offcutter, in at off stump on a length, drawing him forward and getting the edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chatara, FOUR runs
